Package de.axxepta.converterservices.proc

Class PipeExec

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.axxepta.converterservices.proc.PipeExec

  • public class PipeExec
extends java.lang.Object
    Can be called as command line pipeline processing tool. Provide an XML pipeline description file as first parameter (see in the Wiki for more information).

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • execProcessFile

        public static java.lang.Object execProcessFile​(java.lang.String file,
                                               java.lang.String... externalWorkPath)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                               java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                               javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                               java.io.IOException,
                                               org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                               javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Executes a pipeline described in a passed file. Look in the wiki for further information.
        Parameters:
        file - XML pipeline description input file name
        externalWorkPath - External work path, will only be used of none is defined in the pipe itself.
        Returns:
        Last step's output or Integer with value -1 if an error occurred during Pipeline execution code
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the pipeline description contains invalid components
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the step type attribute is missing
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if the XML description structure is not valid XML
        java.io.IOException - if no XML DOM can be build from the description
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if a XSLT step fails
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - if the XPath processing for pipeline parsing fails

      • execProcessString

        public static java.lang.Object execProcessString​(java.lang.String xmlString,
                                                 java.lang.String... externalWorkPath)
                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                 java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                 javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                 java.io.IOException,
                                                 org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                 javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Executes a pipeline described in a passed String. Look in the wiki for further information.
        Parameters:
        xmlString - Pipeline description input XML String
        externalWorkPath - External work path, will only be used of none is defined in the pipe itself.
        Returns:
        Last step's output or Integer with value -1 if an error occurred during Pipeline execution code
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the pipeline description contains invalid components
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the step type attribute is missing
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if the XML description structure is not valid XML
        java.io.IOException - if no XML DOM can be build from the description
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if an XSLT step fails
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - if the XPath processing for pipeline parsing fails

      • execProcess

        public static java.lang.Object execProcess​(org.w3c.dom.Document dom,
                                           java.lang.String... externalWorkPath)
                                    throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException,
                                           java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Executes a pipeline described in a passed XML DOM. Look in the wiki for further information.
        Parameters:
        dom - Pipeline description as XML DOM
        externalWorkPath - External work path, will only be used of none is defined in the pipe itself.
        Returns:
        Last step's output or Integer with value -1 if an error occurred during Pipeline execution code
        Throws:
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - - if the XPath processing for pipeline parsing fails
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the step type attribute is missing
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the pipeline description contains invalid components
